author: Michael Canny
comment: A nice selection of relatively interesting, but limited, customisations but on my Huawei watch it consumes huge amounts of battery vs the standard options (8 hours vs several days of the same use). The watch is also slow to come out of sleep with this enabled and transitions through a black and white minimal face first. As a result I'm no longer using it.
title: Really like the design but issues on Huawei

author: DJ BYer
comment: Settings dont ever take effect and the movement isnt smooth. Worst menu. Google play wont refund. No phone app.
title: Huawei

author: Corrie Nicholls
comment: I love this watch face. It's gorgeous!
title: Beautiful

author: galactic tacos
comment: Took me a while to work it out but finally got it and love it

author: Max Wong
comment: dont know how to change the different watch faces

author: Jay Patel
comment: I purchased the watch face and it did not show up on my phone or on the Android Wear.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Please contact us at scoondesign@gmail.com for support. We'd love to solve any issues you may be having.

title: Never got the watch face

author: paul richman
comment: Tons of options. Sumptuous design. Amazing animated tourbillon and gears. A rotor that actually rotates as your wrist turns, just like real one!  And, wonderfully,  you can choose the timeout interval up to 30 sec!  I wish I could change the color of the rotor, perhaps dark blue.
title: Great face

author: Burndawg 130i
comment: I really like the multi coloured graffitti look.  Nice face! 4stars due to the price as others of similar quality are cheaper.
title: Nice

author: Graham Hilling
comment: Love the face but desperately let down by the poor ambient mode.... 😕
title: Love the face....

author: michael webber
comment: Did nothing it never got installed to my device
